originalText.text: Gorgeous venue! It ended up being a little bigger than we wanted for our wedding but the place is stunning! You barely need decorations. I loved that it felt like you were away from the city while literally having it as your background.

text.text: Gorgeous venue! It ended up being a little bigger than we wanted for our wedding but the place is stunning! You barely need decorations. I loved that it felt like you were away from the city while literally having it as your background.

originalText.text: What a unique and cute church. I had the privilege of photographing my friends Bram and Esther's wedding there on a wintry January afternoon. The church was transformed into a space that fit their wedding just perfectly. Even on a colder January saturday, we still had plenty of spaces to create some magic. I can't imagine just how beautiful this venue must be during the spring, summer and fall!

text.text: What a unique and cute church. I had the privilege of photographing my friends Bram and Esther's wedding there on a wintry January afternoon. originalText.text:
Dear Frank, Gene, and Alfonso,

We wanted to take a moment to express our gratitude for a spectacular evening held on November 9th. Your venue was a perfect place for us to relax and mingle with elegance and comfort. We cannot stop talking about the food you served, the open bar accommodation and the staff who took care of us. The professionalism and courtesy provided made this a night to remember. Everyone had a wonderful time setting the stage for a great conference.

We appreciate your hard work and dedication in making this such a memorable occasion. We hope that you found the event to be a valuable opportunity to showcase your products and services to a wider audience.

Thank you again for your support. We look forward to working with you in the future.

Kind regards,
Dr. Kenneth Simpson and Team
Cornell University
College of Veterinary Medicine

originalText.text:
The best. The absolute best. Frank, Alfonso and the entire staff are fantastic.
The venue is gorgeous and spacious, the views of NYC are spectacular, the food and drinks are delicious and the whole team at The Sanctuary are eager to help you have the best time, whatever the occasion.
Cannot connot cannot recommend this venue enough.

originalText.text: My wedding reception here was the most beautiful event, and the team at The Sanctuary, through their beautiful setting, delicious catering and professionalism and insistence on making everything perfect on our special day. The views, the service, the beauty of the restored church cannot be beat.  I honestly believe that God sent me this venue to work with because it was HEAVEN SENT! I loved everything about our wedding reception. Brides, look no further.
